long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save ads from Facebook's Ad Library, TikTok's Ad Library, and TikTok Creative Center, and collaborate with your team to find the best ad inspiration.

Motion’s Creative Research is the best free solution to collecting ad inspiration from Facebook and TikTok and sharing them with your team or agency.

This extension lets you:
- Save ads from Facebook's Ad Library, TikTok's Ad Library, and TikTok Creative Center
- Organize these ads and share with your team
- Keep these ads (and their metadata) forever
…all entirely free
